item.description:
Hello My Dear German Culture Lovers!

A few of us are going to see the show STOMP on Saturday the 21st of February, the 5 p.m. showing. After that we are planning on having a few drinks and dinner at the TAZZA Cafe on Westminster Street, hoping some of you could join us there for a fun Saturday night.

If you guys are up to it we could even go for a "pub crawl" and maybe even dancing in one of the many Providence Bars or Clubs.

It is Carnival-time in Germany anyway :-)!! Time for some fun!!

Sooooo, if you think that sounds kinda fun, then meet us at the TAZZA Cafe in a couple of weeks! I'd be happy to see you all again!

Regards and warm thoughts,

Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the black-red and yellow flag!!
item.name: Dinner, drinks and.... dance??
